resources.string: Settings values will be applied at next launching.
You need to go home right now.
"Can't connect Wifi currently.\n Using data network may be charged lots of coats."
Please make enable Wifi or data network.
Cannot find destination position.\nPlease try again.
Poor network condition.\nPlease try again later.
IamHome is closed abnormally. Restart application now.
IamHome is closed abnormally. Report errors now.
It will be set from next launching if you change values
Please input phone number to call back
Cannot catch a signal for GPS
IamHome is force closed by the user
Please make sure your destination. Marker will be placed at searched address. Please make long tap at your correct destination.
Check your current location on map\n The current position on map may not accurate.\n Tip: Press a menu key to check a distance to destination"
"Are you sure to set here as destination address?"
Minimum distance to destination from user
Show a dialog on a map
Do you want to see a dialog on a map every time?

The aim of this application is to protect your lovely people.
 1. I am Home.
 You can check your couple going home safely. You can also check son and daughter to go school safely.
 Send a text message to designated phone number automatically when reaching the destination with selected minimum distance. 2. Settings.
 You can set the minimum distance from the destination and the minimum frequency to update GPS.


 Please tap below advertisement for better application.
I am Home.\nSet your destination, a message what you want to send and a person who will get your message.
Minimum distance to destination from user
Minimum distance to destination from user
Minimum distance to destination from user

You can set default setting values.\n Minimum frequency GPS - How often do you want to update GPS?\n Minimum distance from destination - This application will be closed finally according to this minimum value.
